messages.subject: Re: Homeschooling in Guam
messages.msgSnippet: ... have you tried the search engine http://www.northernlight.com i did a quick search for keywords homeschooling guam and the top result is a site
messages.messageBody:
> Date: 7 Aug 1999 19:53:55 -0000
> To: Unschooling-dotcom@onelist.com
> From: hawk141@...
> Reply-to: Unschooling-dotcom@onelist.com
> Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Homeschooling in Guam

> From: hawk141@...
>
> Anyone have any info on this? I have searched and
> only found the laws, no groups or contacts. Any
> info would be greatly appreciated. ~ TIA, Shannon
> in CA ~ Sorry if this is a duplicate post and you
> have seen it on another list. :-)
>
have you tried the search engine http://www.northernlight.com

i did a quick search for keywords homeschooling guam and the top
result is a site http://www.heptune.com

their homeschooling FAQ page is http://www.heptune.com/school.html

which also leads to their email address: heptune@...

it's a start but they might have a list of support groups or other
contacts to share! you might want to poke around some more at
northernlights too. good luck!


Michele Moss
Infinity Computer Solutions
Great Falls, MT
406-727-5609
http://www.icstech.net

messages.subject: Homeschooling in Guam
messages.msgSnippet: Anyone have any info on this?  I have searched and only found the laws, no groups or contacts. Any info would be greatly appreciated. ~ TIA, Shannon in CA ~
messages.messageBody:
Anyone have any info on this? I have searched and
only found the laws, no groups or contacts. Any
info would be greatly appreciated. ~ TIA, Shannon
in CA ~ Sorry if this is a duplicate post and you
have seen it on another list. :-)
